com.mapbox.services.directions.v4.models

Class RouteStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.directions.v4.models.RouteStep

  • public class RouteStep
extends java.lang.Object
    The instructions for a route are broken down into steps with each step containing details like heading, direction, way name, and duration.

      The clockwise angle from true north to the direction of travel immediately following the maneuver.

      • getDirection

        public java.lang.String getDirection()
        The approximate cardinal direction of travel following the maneuver. Typically one of the following: 'N', 'NE', 'E', 'SE', 'S', 'SW', 'W', or 'NW'.
        Returns:
        string containing abbreviated cardinal direction.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(java.lang.String direction)

      • getHeading

        public double getHeading()
        The clockwise angle from true north to the direction of travel immediately following the maneuver.
        Returns:
        double value ranging from 0 to 359.
